thread.title: BRIEF-Matica Technologies H1 revenue up at EUR 16.8 mln
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Matica Technologies H1 revenue up at EUR 16.8 mln

title: BRIEF-Matica Technologies H1 revenue up at EUR 16.8 mln
text:
BRIEF-Matica Technologies H1 revenue up at EUR 16.8 mln Sept 30 
Sept 30 Matica Technologies AG : 
* H1 revenues 16.8 million euros ($18.8 million)(up 20.9 pct year-on-year) 
* H1 EBIT 1.06 million euros (up 94.1 pct year-on-year) 
* H1 profit before tax at 1.022 million euros versus 501,000 euros year ago Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: ($1 = 0.8921 euros) (Gdynia Newsroom) Trending On Reuters
